question:
Recently, 22° circular halo was observed in the atmosphere. Which of the following statements is/are correct about the same?
  1. It is an optical phenomenon produced by light interacting with ice crystals suspended in upper troposphere
  2. It can be observed around sun as well as around moon
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: 22° circular halo was recently observed in Kolkata. It is an optical phenomenon produced by light interacting with ice crystals suspended in upper troposphere. It appears as a large ring around the Sun or Moon with a radius of about 22°.
